00018   string SourceMap::generate_source_map(Context &ctx) {
00019 
00020     const bool include_sources = ctx.source_map_contents;
00021     const vector<string> includes = ctx.include_links;
00022     const vector<const char*> sources = ctx.sources;
00023 
00024     JsonNode* json_srcmap = json_mkobject();
00025 
00026     json_append_member(json_srcmap, "version", json_mknumber(3));
00027 
00028     // pass-through sourceRoot option
00029     if (!ctx.source_map_root.empty()) {
00030       JsonNode* root = json_mkstring(ctx.source_map_root.c_str());
00031       json_append_member(json_srcmap, "sourceRoot", root);
00032     }
00033 
00034     const char *include = file.c_str();
00035     JsonNode *json_include = json_mkstring(include);
00036     json_append_member(json_srcmap, "file", json_include);
00037 
00038     JsonNode *json_includes = json_mkarray();
00039     for (size_t i = 0; i < source_index.size(); ++i) {
00040       const char *include = includes[source_index[i]].c_str();
00041       JsonNode *json_include = json_mkstring(include);
00042       json_append_element(json_includes, json_include);
00043     }
00044     json_append_member(json_srcmap, "sources", json_includes);
00045 
00046     JsonNode *json_contents = json_mkarray();
00047     if (include_sources) {
00048       for (size_t i = 0; i < source_index.size(); ++i) {
00049         const char *content = sources[source_index[i]];
00050         JsonNode *json_content = json_mkstring(content);
00051         json_append_element(json_contents, json_content);
00052       }
00053     }
00054     json_append_member(json_srcmap, "sourcesContent", json_contents);
00055 
00056     string mappings = serialize_mappings();
00057     JsonNode *json_mappings = json_mkstring(mappings.c_str());
00058     json_append_member(json_srcmap, "mappings", json_mappings);
00059 
00060     JsonNode *json_names = json_mkarray();
00061     // so far we have no implementation for names
00062     // no problem as we do not alter any identifiers
00063     json_append_member(json_srcmap, "names", json_names);
00064 
00065     char *str = json_stringify(json_srcmap, "\t");
00066     string result = string(str);
00067     free(str);
00068     json_delete(json_srcmap);
00069     return result;
00070   }
00071 
00072   string SourceMap::serialize_mappings() {
00073     string result = "";
00074 
00075     size_t previous_generated_line = 0;
00076     size_t previous_generated_column = 0;
00077     size_t previous_original_line = 0;
00078     size_t previous_original_column = 0;
00079     size_t previous_original_file = 0;
00080     for (size_t i = 0; i < mappings.size(); ++i) {
00081       const size_t generated_line = mappings[i].generated_position.line;
00082       const size_t generated_column = mappings[i].generated_position.column;
00083       const size_t original_line = mappings[i].original_position.line;
00084       const size_t original_column = mappings[i].original_position.column;
00085       const size_t original_file = mappings[i].original_position.file;
00086 
00087       if (generated_line != previous_generated_line) {
00088         previous_generated_column = 0;
00089         if (generated_line > previous_generated_line) {
00090           result += std::string(generated_line - previous_generated_line, ';');
00091           previous_generated_line = generated_line;
00092         }
00093       }
00094       else if (i > 0) {
00095         result += ",";
00096       }
00097 
00098       // generated column
00099       result += base64vlq.encode(static_cast<int>(generated_column) - static_cast<int>(previous_generated_column));
00100       previous_generated_column = generated_column;
00101       // file
00102       result += base64vlq.encode(static_cast<int>(original_file) - static_cast<int>(previous_original_file));
00103       previous_original_file = original_file;
00104       // source line
00105       result += base64vlq.encode(static_cast<int>(original_line) - static_cast<int>(previous_original_line));
00106       previous_original_line = original_line;
00107       // source column
00108       result += base64vlq.encode(static_cast<int>(original_column) - static_cast<int>(previous_original_column));
00109       previous_original_column = original_column;
00110     }
00111 
00112     return result;
00113   }

00115   void SourceMap::prepend(const OutputBuffer& out)
00116   {
00117     Offset size(out.smap.current_position);
00118     for (Mapping mapping : out.smap.mappings) {
00119       if (mapping.generated_position.line > size.line) {
00120         throw(runtime_error("prepend sourcemap has illegal line"));
00121       }
00122       if (mapping.generated_position.line == size.line) {
00123         if (mapping.generated_position.column > size.column) {
00124           throw(runtime_error("prepend sourcemap has illegal column"));
00125         }
00126       }
00127     }
00128     // will adjust the offset
00129     prepend(Offset(out.buffer));
00130     // now add the new mappings
00131     VECTOR_UNSHIFT(mappings, out.smap.mappings);
00132   }
00133 
00134   void SourceMap::append(const OutputBuffer& out)
00135   {
00136     append(Offset(out.buffer));
00137   }
00138 
00139   void SourceMap::prepend(const Offset& offset)
00140   {
00141     if (offset.line != 0 || offset.column != 0) {
00142       for (Mapping& mapping : mappings) {
00143         // move stuff on the first old line
00144         if (mapping.generated_position.line == 0) {
00145           mapping.generated_position.column += offset.column;
00146         }
00147         // make place for the new lines
00148         mapping.generated_position.line += offset.line;
00149       }
00150     }
00151     if (current_position.line == 0) {
00152       current_position.column += offset.column;
00153     }
00154     current_position.line += offset.line;
00155   }
00156 
00157   void SourceMap::append(const Offset& offset)
00158   {
00159     current_position += offset;
00160   }
00161 
00162   void SourceMap::add_open_mapping(AST_Node* node)
00163   {
00164     mappings.push_back(Mapping(node->pstate(), current_position));
00165   }
00166 
00167   void SourceMap::add_close_mapping(AST_Node* node)
00168   {
00169     mappings.push_back(Mapping(node->pstate() + node->pstate().offset, current_position));
00170   }
00171 
00172   ParserState SourceMap::remap(const ParserState& pstate) {
00173     for (size_t i = 0; i < mappings.size(); ++i) {
00174       if (
00175         mappings[i].generated_position.file == pstate.file &&
00176         mappings[i].generated_position.line == pstate.line &&
00177         mappings[i].generated_position.column == pstate.column
00178       ) return ParserState(pstate.path, pstate.src, mappings[i].original_position, pstate.offset);
00179     }
00180     return ParserState(pstate.path, pstate.src, Position(-1, -1, -1), Offset(0, 0));
00181 
00182   }
